description: Library &/or survey based project or laboratory project involving research & analysis of a specific topic in biotechnology. The area of work may be the technology or business of biotechnology. Students completing the course over two semesters must enrol in BIOT7000 if commencing in sem 1 & finishing sem 2; BIOT7002 if commencing in sem 2 & finishing sem 1; BIOT7019 if commencing in sem 2 & finishing in summer semester; BIOT7004 if commencing in summer semester & finishing in sem 1. Students completing the course in a single semester must enrol in BIOT7003.
